description: This is an interface definition for note repository operations in a note-taking backend system, specifying methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes.

classes.name: INoteRepository
classes.description: Interface defining repository operations for Note entities, including CRUD methods.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Creates a new note and returns the created note.

methods.name: GetAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes as an enumerable collection.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier; returns null if not found.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note; returns the updated note or null if not found.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its identifier; returns true if successful.
